data.eml:eml:
Waternet is the only water company in the Netherlands that covers the whole water cycle. We provide a safe, clean and sufficient supply of water. This includes water for nature areas and human consumption.

We work in Amsterdam and surrounding area. Approximately 1,3 million people live in our service area.

Positive observations without protocol

Resolution of dataset available in 5 x 5 km. Higher resolution available via https://www.ndff.nl / serviceteamndff@natuurloket.nl

8,414 records (May 2018)
